TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationBuilder extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class ConfigurationBuilder Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 表示由自訂設定產生器實作擴充的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class to be extended by custom configuration builder implementations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 衍生自這個類別，以從您想要取用使用標準的.NET Framework 應用程式中的外部來源讀取設定API。Derive from this class to read configuration from an external source that you would like to consume in your .NET Framework application using the standard API. ConfigurationBuilders 會讀取環境變數、 Azure 金鑰保存庫和許多其他來源的 NuGet.org。ConfigurationBuilders are available on NuGet.org to read from environment variables, Azure key vault, and a number of other sources. ConfigurationBuilders 的數個實作都是從 NuGet.org:Several implementations of ConfigurationBuilders are available from NuGet.org: - [EnvironmentConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.Environment/) -讀取環境變數。[EnvironmentConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.Environment/) - Read from environment variables. - [AzureKeyVaultConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.Azure/) -讀取 Azure 金鑰保存庫。[AzureKeyVaultConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.Azure/) - Read from Azure Key Vault. - [UserSecretsConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecrets/) -讀取 usersecrets 檔案在磁碟上，類似於 ASP.NET Core 功能。[UserSecretsConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.UserSecrets/) - Read from a usersecrets file on disk, similar to the ASP.NET Core functionality. - [SimpleJsonConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.Json/) -讀取從 JSON 檔案。[SimpleJsonConfigBuilder](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilders.Json/) - Read from a JSON file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作簡單的 ConfigurationBuilder 讀取環境變數：The following example shows how to implement a simple ConfigurationBuilder to read Environment variables: [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder/CS/SampleConfigurationBuilder.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder/vb/SampleConfigurationBuilder.vb)] 下列範例是組態檔的摘錄，套用至先前的範例。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file as it applies to the previous example. 這套 appSettings 組態中的環境變數，並使這些值位於。This applies environment variables to the appSettings configuration and makes those values available under . ```xml
```

Public Overridable Function ProcessConfigurationSection (configSection As ConfigurationSection) As ConfigurationSection

abstract member ProcessConfigurationSection : System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection -> System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection override this.ProcessConfigurationSection : System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection -> System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 接受來自設定系統的 物件，並傳回已修改或新的 物件供進一步利用。

span.span: Accepts a object from the configuration system and returns a modified or new object for further use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode ProcessRawXml(class System.Xml.XmlNode rawXml) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ProcessRawXml (rawXml As XmlNode) As XmlNode
abstract member ProcessRawXml : System.Xml.XmlNode -> System.Xml.XmlNode override this.ProcessRawXml : System.Xml.XmlNode -> System.Xml.XmlNode

summary.span: 接受表示原始設定區段來自設定檔的 ，並傳回已修改或新的 供進一步使用。

span.span: Accepts an representing the raw configuration section from a config file and returns a modified or new for further use.
